title: Bubble Machine
summaries: The Bubble Machine is a novelty furniture mechanism purchased from the Party Girl for 4 during the day / at any time. When placed, it continuously produces bubbles. These bubbles are purely visual, have no functional effect, and can be produced infinitely at no cost.

Each bubble is of a random size, and a random one of four possible colors: Pink, purple, green, or blue. With no obstacles in the way, bubbles last for random durations. They will pop on contact with characters or foreground <linked>blocks</linked>.
It can be activated and deactivated via <linked>wire</linked>, but is always on by default when first placed.

statistics.Buy: 4
statistics.Sell: 80
